name: ai-interview-assistant
description: AI-powered interview assistant with real-time transcription and response generation

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
